rows.label: qst104505_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmm? What're you after?
Oh right, the Metal Brooches
I told that Nopon about.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0002
rows.name:
Yeah, those tend to get washed up
on the shore near here, the one with
a view of Triedge Isle.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0003
rows.name:
The cool thing about them is, you can
use them as the ultimate piece in the
Duelling Kingdoms board game.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0004
rows.name:
It's a local rule around here,
not something official.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0005
rows.name:
As anyone can see, there isn't much
civilization here on Temperantia, so
we're starved for things to do.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0006
rows.name:
The board games we brought with
us are one of the few forms of
entertainment we have.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0007
rows.name:
But we'd get bored just playing them
over and over, so we started adding
new rules to keep things interesting.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0008
rows.name:
Anyway, if those Nopon do start
selling Metal Brooches, I reckon
they'll sell like nobody's business.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0009
rows.name:
But there are nasty monsters on that
coast where they wash up, so I told
the Nopon not to go looking.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0010
rows.name:
It'd be a right shame all round
if they came all the way out here
just to become monster chow.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0011
rows.name:
You seem to be able to take care of
yourselves, so by all means head down
to that coast and have a look around.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0101
rows.name:
You can find Metal Brooches on
the coast just nearby.

rows.label: qst104505_msg0102
rows.name:
They're a pretty hot commodity
among the soldiers here right now.
We'll pay good money for them!
